import check from './check.png' import edit from './draw.png' import pause from './pause.png' import play from './play-button-arrowhead.png' import trash from './trash-bin.png' import axios from 'axios' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const AdminPage = () => { const [coinsArr, setcoinsArr] = useState([]); const [deactivatedArr, setdeactivatedArr] = useState([]); const [reviewedArr, setreviewedArr] = useState([]); useEffect( () => { axios.get('https://coinscore-cc-backend.onrender.com/api/collections/getcoins') .then(data => setcoinsArr(data.data.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) setreviewedArr(coinsArr.filter((item) => item.isReviewed)) setdeactivatedArr(coinsArr.filter((item) => !(item.isActive))) return(

); } export default AdminPage;
